{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3485872,"name":"N Miller (Mechanic/Electrician)","username":"25MustangMech1418","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/25mustangmech1418/{size}/241230_2.png","created_at":"2025-01-17T18:56:14.316Z","cooked":"

Our team was discussion where we going to put the Limelight on our robot, but wev’ve been running into issues on how to position it. We want it to be able to see the AprilTags on the Reef and at the Coral Refill Station, but we are unsure about what angle is needed to see both.

Furthermore, where would we put it? Should we try to mount it higher (if it gets too high, would we lose sight of the bottom tag)? Mount it on the chassis?

Has anyone else run into these problems? What has your team done?

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":2,"updated_at":"2025-01-17T18:56:14.316Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":92,"reads":113,"readers_count":112,"score":497.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":482319,"topic_slug":"limelight-positioning-for-reefscape","display_username":"N Miller (Mechanic/Electrician)","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":55526,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"N Miller"},"post_url":"/t/limelight-positioning-for-reefscape/482319/1","custom_user_title":"N Miller","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3485891,"name":"Joseph Gonzalo Amador","username":"Joseph_Amador","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/j/919ad9/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-01-17T19:17:34.390Z","cooked":"

The more important tags will be the ones on the reef. The driver can manually line up/smash into the feeding station.
We are planning on having one limelight on the front of our robot, relatively low, that can see the Reef tags. Then as we get closer, we have another behind our elevator that can see the tags once the elevator has been raised a certain amount.
